Trigger You are about to roll a Perception, Stealth, or Survival check for initiative.

You visually or audibly warn your allies of danger, granting them each a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls, or a +2 circumstance bonus if you're using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Scout] exploration activity. Depending on whether you use gestures or call out, this action gains either the visual or the auditory trait, respectively.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Scout's Warning]
